products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Groove joints to be done for erection of pipes with proper couplings and fasteners. All escavations, pedestal supports, structural supports shall be of vendor's scope. 150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint: groove joints with proper couplings and fasteners, scope: all excavations, pedestal supports, structural supports by vendor

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications 150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: c class (heavy class), standard: indian standard 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, fittings included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to ms brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, requirement: fire authorities, location: above ground, specification: as per specifications

products_entries.full_product_description: 12 | Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board two stage filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 2000 Sq.Mtr

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: imager: CMOS, feature: combined with multiple photodiode, feature: very early warning, feature: minimal nuisance alarms, filter: Smart on-board two stage filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance
